raw_text: JOSEPHINE SIVASAMBOO – It is with great sadness that the family of Mrs Josephine Sivasamboo announces her passing. Josephine was the loving wife of (late) T. Sivasamboo,​ mother of Ravi Sivasamboo,​ mother-in-law of Marianne,​ Grandmother of Christopher & Christina and great grandmother of Nathan. Final respects can be paid at Modern Florist Funeral Palour,​ No. 109,​ Negombo Road,​ Kandana. The burial takes place on Thursday,​ 5th October 2023 at the Welisara General Cemetery (opposite Phoenix Showroom) at 4.00 pm.063222

PERUMAL FELIX ANTHONY – Chairman,​ Vigilant Security & Investigation Services. Dearly beloved husband of late Chitra,​ loving father of Surani,​ Roshni & Mario,​ loved father-in-law of Michael De Silva & Nedra,​ loving grandfather of Jannik & Tehanee,​ Keshia & Rashmika,​ Tehra & Anaya,​ son of late Aloy & late Therese,​ brother of Vilma Navaratnam,​ Inez Panambalana,​ Evan & Walter (All Decd.),​ Jean Dharmaratne & Bryan. Remains lie at “The Restpect Home” by Jayaratne’s,​ Borella on Thursday 5th October from 9.00 a.m. Cortege leaves Parlour at 4.00 p.m. on Friday 6th October for burial at General Cemetery,​ Kanatte Catholic Section.062958
